SPART.BSM module¶

Run the BSM soil model

param soilpar

Object with attributes [B, lat, lon] / dry soil spectra, and SMp, SMC, film

type soilpar

SoilParameters

param soilspec

Contains keys [‘GSV’, ‘kw’, ‘nw’] which key the Global Soil Vectors, water absorption constants for the spectrum and water refraction index for the spectrum. Loaded in in the main run_spart script and passed to this function.

type soilspec

dict

returns

rtype

SoilOptics

SPART-python
